sentence: The "Take Back Congress Candidate Forum” will be littered with 10 congressional Trump acolytes like Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio and 13 hopefuls such as United States Senate candidate Herschel Walker of Georgia.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Donald Trump to host ‘Magapalooza’ at Mar-a-Lago on Wednesday

sentence: "Apart from the former president himself, his son Donald Trump Jr., former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, Senator Ted Cruz, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, Nigel Farage, and Rep Jim Jordan are among the high-profile speakers.While devoted fans are anticipating Trump's undeniably poignant and likely lengthy speech (as usual), other prominent conservatives took their moment to weigh in.
title: The Republican Awakening

sentence: Trump said that he remembered talking to House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, Republican Jim Jordan and other people during that period.

title: Trump deflects blame for January 6 silence, says he wanted to march to Capitol
